entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:14 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 03:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -43.3°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
